DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective: To assess the efficacy of APD209 in adult patients with active cachexia associated with advanced malignancy and not caused by simple starvation. Secondary Objective: To assess the safety of APD209 in patients with advanced malignancy and active cachexia.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of APD209 in Cancer Cachexia
DOC.criteria: Involuntary loss of weight of >= 2% in 2 months or >= 5% in 6 months, and ongoing in recent weeks, without (or with successfully treated) secondary causes of impaired oral nutritional intake (simple starvation).
